Show the topic list

Source: R/fct-topics.R
show_topics.Rd

Show the topic list

show_topics(category = NULL)

Arguments

category

If specified, gives only topics in the given category (name in topic_list)

Value

Prints out available topics by package

Examples

# \dontrun{
show_topics() # Show a list of topics, organized by category

#> base topics:
#>  "as.character"
#>  "as.factor"
#>  "as.numeric"
#>  "c"
#>  "ceiling"
#>  "class"
#>  "data.frame"
#>  "dir.exists"
#>  "file.exists"
#>  "file.path"
#>  "floor"
#>  "getwd"
#>  "head"
#>  "ifelse"
#>  "install.packages"
#>  "length"
#>  "levels"
#>  "library"
#>  "log"
#>  "max"
#>  "mean"
#>  "median"
#>  "min"
#>  "nchar"
#>  "ncol"
#>  "nrow"
#>  "round"
#>  "sd"
#>  "setwd"
#>  "sqrt"
#>  "sum"
#>  "summary"
#>  "table"
#>  "tail"
#> datasets topics:
#>  "carnivores"
#>  "msleep"

#>  "anti_join"

# Show all topics in the `dplyr` category
show_topics(category = 'dplyr') 

#> 
#>  "anti_join"
#>  "arrange"
#>  "bind_cols"
#>  "case_when"
#>  "count"
#>  "distinct"
#>  "filter"
#>  "full_join"
#>  "glimpse"
#>  "group_by"
#>  "if_else"
#>  "inner_join"
#>  "left_join"
#>  "mutate"
#>  "n"
#>  "pull"
#>  "rename"
#>  "right_join"
#>  "select"
#>  "slice"
#>  "summarize"
#>  "tally"
#>  "ungroup"
# Show all topics in the `dplyr` and `tidyr` categories
show_topics(category = c('dplyr', 'tidyr')) 

#> dplyr topics:
#>  "anti_join"
#>  "arrange"
